description: i dont even know how to use this password thing
Like the look and practical use of this app. Don't have to plan out a password. Thanks so much for making this!

Perfect for the security conscious. No integrations to automatically fill in fields or anything like that, which is desireable for those concerned with security and not intergration with outside software. It stays simple, straightforward, free of bloatware, and keeps itsself safely self-contained. Which is exactly how a security focussed application should be, you have complete control of how its data (namely the generated passwords) is moved about, exactly as it should be. You, the human user, knowns when and where the pwasswords are moved to the clipboard.
summary: Does what it's supposed to with no bloatware

description: Tries to get network access that Apparmor blocks. Tries to get play and record sound permisions and operation as a network service permission. Developer website and email is down.
summary: Tries to get network access no developer contact

description:
Installée avec le gestionnaire d'applications Ubuntu, utilisée => parfait.
Nota : j'aurais mis le mot de passe en mode masqué à l'écran par défaut, mais comme il conserve le paramétrage c'est très bien comme ça.
